name: Paper Wizard (itch)
description:
A fun top-down shooter game where you play as the Paper Wizard! A veteran of the craft draw, it is your job to defend the papercraft supplies against the evil orcs who want to take over and hoard the supplies for themselves!

Kill the evil orcs and their slower but stronger creations, the OGRES with your magic projectiles and survive as long as you can!

Music: "Fuzzball Parade" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
